Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► occupied by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) and home to wife of Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► occupied by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) and home to wife of Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener

= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
literally: daughters of a town, region, nation; hence: = women that are inhabitants of a place, town, region, or nation, ◄ as if they were the female offspring of that place
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine

Node.gloss: to be straight in the eyes (of someone) > to be accepted|to be approved|to please
Node.definition: literally: to be straight in the eyes of someone; hence: = state/process by which humans consider someone or something good

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= a ground for a conflict
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

Node.gloss: to hold responsible|to call to account|to seek an occasion against (someone else)
Node.definition: literallly: to seek from (someone else's) hand; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities lay the responsiblity for something that happened on someone else and require compensation or punishment
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= a shorter or longer moment in the passage of time
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► occupied by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) and home to wife of Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= field where grapes (עֲנָב) are cultivated, growing on vines (גֶּפֶן) typically surrounded by a stone wall, and equipped with a watchtower (מִגְדָּל) and a wine press (יֶקֶב)
= town; ◄ territory of Dan (דָּן) ► occupied by Philistines (פְּלִשְׁתִּי) and home to wife of Samson (שִׁמְשֹׁון)
= a young male lion (אֲרִי) ≈ regarded as fierce and dangerous

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength
= action by which animals, humans, or deities produce a full, deep, prolonged sound as made by a lion; ≈ associated with aggression, but also with suffering
= action by which humans purposefully move in the direction of (another) human, deity, or object to engage with them

Node.gloss: to rush (upon), to come (over)|to possess, grip, take control
Node.definition: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= the male young of a goat (עֵז)
= a reference to any object

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant

= the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= a large gathering of humans or creatures ► usually for a specific purpose

= flying insect that collects nectar from flowers and converts it into honey; lives in swarms made up of many thousands of insects; sting only when threatened; ≈ with connotations ranging from positive (food producing) to negative (as metaphor for an army of well organized enemies
= the physical structure, including the bones, flesh, and organs, of a person or animal, either alive or dead

= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility
= causative action by which humans use their hands as a shovel and remove a substance from a particular location

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
= a group of people to which one traces one's ancestry; ◄ smallest unit within family group

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which humans or deities take over the ownership of land from other humans, which usually implies that the former owners are driven away

marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent villages (חָצֵר) settlements (בַּת) and pasturelands (מִגְרָשׁ) ≈ associated with strength and security

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time
= celestial body ► that marks day and night and produces warmth and light for the earth

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which food tastes well
= sweet substance ◄ made either by bees, or from fruits such as dates, grapes or figs; ► much appreciated as food; ≈ associated with abundance and fertility

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
= state in which a person, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression and strength

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker indicating that if the event in focus would not have been true another event would not haven taken place

= causative action by which someone breaks the soil with the help of a plow, pulled by domestic animals; ► to make it ready for cultivation; ≈ usually regarded as a strenuous task which requires much energy
= female young of a cow (פָּרָה) ► used as sacrifice
literally: to find (in someone); hence: = process by which humans come upon certain information
= action by which humans or deities utter words that are often compacted and well formulated and that require wisdom to be understood

Node.gloss: to rush (upon), to come (over)|to possess, grip, take control
Node.definition: = action by which an outside force (perhaps divine) quickly comes over a person, gaining control over the person or causing some immediate outcome

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to go down|to come down|to climb down|to step down|to descend
Node.definition: = action by which human, animals, or deities move (voluntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place
= town; ◄ located in Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) ► one of the five cities of the Philistines (פְּלֶשֶׁת)
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= things in someone's possession, such as clothes and weapons
= set of inanimate objects that belong together
= action by which humans or deities utter words that are often compacted and well formulated and that require wisdom to be understood
= process by which the anger (אַף) of humans and deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

Node.gloss: to go up|to climb up|to mount
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals or objects go to a place that is situated at a higher elevation, by foot, carried by hand, or with the help of a vehicle
literally: house; hence: = a group of people associated with a house, such as the family living there, or the descendants of the head of the household
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= man; ◄ son of Manoah (מָנֹוחַ) ► judge of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a person with whom someone has a bond of mutual affection and respect and trust
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which one of the bridegroom's friends accompanies and assists the bridegroom during on his wedding
